note.p: Career: With his friend Desaguliers studied the Newcomen engine which was tested at Griff (1711) and erected a Newcomen engine at Newcastle; Editor of the 'Ladies; Diary', in which he endeavoured to introduce his readers to mathematics (1718-death); made a number of maps and drawings of Warwickshire
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; Taylor; Taylor Hanoverian
Notes: Proposed by John Theophilus Desaguliers. DNB gives burial date as 11 October 1743
